TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000Hr0rL:ref

Hi Zachary, that's correct yes. We updated them two maybe three weeks ago. I assumed they'd update with a force policy like you say but that didn't seem to be the case. I've had a laptop on my desk all day that hadn't updated. I've just been to lunch and come back and it has now updated. Seems to be taking quite a while but that's fine. As long as we've done it correctly.
Thanks
That can be closed.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #425895 - Change Email Address in Client Settings

TextBody:
Hi John,

Thank you for the update and feedback.  The details should be updated immediately when the EPP client checks in to the server for a policy update.  If this change is not effective immediately after connecting to the EPP Server that we will need to collect logs and investigate.   Would you still like us to proceed and close this case?


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

Ticket Details: Hi, When we initially deployed our EPP client to our PC's, the Main Administrator email address was incorrect on the server. We've updated this but the clients still reflect the old address. How do we force the clients to update this?
